summary: Three friends (two guys and one girl) retreat deep into the wilderness for some camping, but after finding a dead body buried near their campsite, they are preyed upon by a shape-shifting cursed entity. Nothing is as it seems.
cast: Andy Callaghan|John Doughty|David Drew|Alice Knapton|Nasif Malik|Maddie Moate|Danny Shayler|Paul Tonkin|Vicky Vatchers
director: Directors: Maurizio del Piccolo, Roberto del Piccolo
title: The Hounds
